register.description: Control Register to Enable/Disable and select modes of operation

bitfield.description: Enable for CAC processing in 2x2 pixel grid. bit[0] - row[0]col[0] bit[1] - row[0]col[1] bit[2] - row[1]col[0] bit[3] - row[1]col[1]. One pixel should be enabled in each row of 2x2. 10 or 01 combinations are allowed in each row. Value should be one of 5, 6, 9, 10

register.description: Actual frame size is configured value + 1

bitfield.description: Number of Lines per frame. Actual Frame height is HEIGHT +1. Actual frame height should minimum of 32 and multiple of 2
Number of pixels per line. Actual Frame width is WIDTH +1. Actual frame width should minimum of 64 and multiple of 2

register.description: Size of Block and each block will have 2 LUT entries with displacement value

bitfield.description: Height and Width of Subsampled Block. Each block will have 2 displacement entries for SIZExSIZE block ; one for even line and other for odd line. Minimum of 8 and maximum of 128. Should be multiple of 4

register.description: LUT Grid size. Should cover frame size plus 1 for interpolation. VCNT * HCNT <= 2048

bitfield.description: LUT Grid heighti, i.e. no. of blocks in vertical direction. (VCNT-1)* BLOCKSZ.SIZE >= frame_height and max value is 512
LUT Grid width, i.e. no. of blocks in horizontal direction. (HCNT-1)* BLOCKSZ.SIZE >= frame_width and max value is 512

register.description: Set on internal interupt event and clr by SW

bitfield.description: status/clear for mmr configuration error. Set when Config access happen to LUT memory in the middle of processing
0-6: CAC corrected line memory. i.e. EnLine0..6 7-9: Bypassed pixel Line memory. i.e. BypLine0..2
Enable for EOF at CAC output
Enable for EOL at CAC output
Enable for SOF at CAC input
Enable for SOL at CAC input
Enable debug features, set to '0' to disable all debug events
Status/Clear for EOF at CAC output. Set on EOF at CAC output
Status/Clear for EOL at CAC output. Set on EOL at CAC output
Status/Clear for SOF at CAC input. Set on SOF at CAC input
Status/Clear for SOL at CAC input. Set on SOL at CAC input
